20101216214912.667|20101216214914.333|CCO|THE SOUTHERN END OF LONG ISLAND 
20101216214914.333|20101216214916.000|CCO|TEEMING TODAY WITH POLICE, 
20101216214916.000|20101216214917.667|CCO|HOMICIDE INVESTIGATORS.
20101216214917.667|20101216214919.333|CCO|THEY ARE AT IT AGAIN. 
20101216214919.333|20101216214921.000|CCO|AT THIS HOUR, THEY ARE EXPANDING
20101216214921.000|20101216214923.500|CCO|THE SEARCH FOR CLUES CONNECTED 
20101216214923.500|20101216214926.000|CCO|TO FOUR SETS OF HUMAN REMAINS, 
20101216214926.000|20101216214928.500|CCO|REMEMBER, THEY WERE FOUND 
20101216214928.500|20101216214931.000|CCO|STARTING SATURDAY AND THEN INTO 
20101216214931.000|20101216214932.667|CCO|MONDAY, ON THIS REMOTE STRETCH 
20101216214932.667|20101216214934.333|CCO|OF BEACH ROAD.
20101216214934.333|20101216214936.000|CCO|THEY HAVE AT THE SCENE A DOZEN 
20101216214936.000|20101216214937.667|CCO|CADAVER DOGS WHICH WOULD SEEM TO
20101216214937.667|20101216214939.333|CCO|SUGGEST THEY ARE NOT RULING OUT 
20101216214939.333|20101216214941.000|CCO|THE POSSIBILITY OF UNEARTHING 
20101216214941.000|20101216214943.000|CCO|EVEN MORE BODIES OUT THERE.
20101216214943.000|20101216214945.000|CCO|AS WE TOLD YOU, LAW ENFORCEMENT 
20101216214945.000|20101216214947.000|CCO|OFFICIALS WARNED THIS MAY 
20101216214947.000|20101216214949.000|CCO|POSSIBLY BE THE WORK OF A SERIAL
20101216214949.000|20101216214951.000|CCO|KILLER, EVEN KILLERS. 
20101216214951.000|20101216214952.667|CCO|ALL FOUR SETS OF REMAINS ARE 
20101216214952.667|20101216214954.333|CCO|BELIEVED TO BE THOSE OF WOMEN.
20101216214954.333|20101216214956.000|CCO|REMEMBER THE FIRST SET FOUND 
20101216214956.000|20101216214957.667|CCO|SATURDAY BY AN OFFICER AND HIS 
20101216214957.667|20101216214959.333|CCO|DOG, BLUE, WHO JUST SO HAPPENED 
20101216214959.333|20101216215001.000|CCO|TO BE OUT IN THE AREA, SEARCHING
20101216215001.000|20101216215002.667|CCO|FOR CLUES IN THE CASE OF A MISS 
20101216215002.667|20101216215004.333|CCO|NEW JERSEY CALL GIRL.
20101216215004.333|20101216215006.000|CCO|SHE WAS 23. 
20101216215006.000|20101216215007.667|CCO|SHE WAS SHANNON GILBERT. 
20101216215007.667|20101216215009.333|CCO|SHE WAS LAST SEEN IN THE AREA 
20101216215009.333|20101216215011.000|CCO|BACK IN MAY. 
20101216215011.000|20101216215012.667|CCO|AND HERE IS ANOTHER CALL GIRL 
20101216215012.667|20101216215014.333|CCO|WHO DISAPPEARED ON LONG ISLAND. 
20101216215014.333|20101216215016.000|CCO|SHE IS A MOTHER FROM MAINE.
20101216215016.000|20101216215017.667|CCO|MEGAN WATERMAN.
20101216215017.667|20101216215019.333|CCO|AND HER DISTRAUGHT MOTHER IS 
20101216215019.333|20101216215021.000|CCO|SPEAKING OUT. 
20101216215021.000|20101216215023.000|CCO|SHE HAS THIS TO SAY.
